author: Kitty Greenwald
title: Mushroom, Tahini and Poached-Egg Toast From the Chefs at Botanica
text:
BEFORE THEY OPENED Botanica, their all-day cafe, restaurant and market in Los Angeles, Heather Sperling and Emily Fiffer were editors at food publications, forever on the hunt for dishes that were both wholesome and delicious—and forever coming up short. “Often, conceptions of healthy cooking were stuck in the ’70s,” Ms. Fiffer said. “We did not get into this industry to make veggie burgers.”
This recipe is hardly warmed-over hippie fare. A thick slab of toast topped with garlicky whipped tahini and a savory mushroom sauté...
